allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Update tests to use ISettingsService and fix package versions

- Update package references to resolve version conflicts \(Microsoft.Extensions.* 8.0.1+\)
- Remove application icon reference \(file not present\)
- Refactor tests to use ISettingsService instead of IOptions<T> pattern
- Update SettingsTests to use unified AppSettings class
- Add missing System.IO using in SessionRepositoryTests

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
